page.title: 19MANNOR FARM
page.content: Mannor Farm is very close to Upper Morton Farm nd in fact is only 100 metres away down the road.It produces dairy products such as milk from the cows and also beef.Modern machinery is used on the farm eg. tractors,combine harvesters and manure spreaders. The house is very old and is a listed building.The farm has two hundred and ten acres of land.Sixty acres are used for growing cereals such as wheat,barley and maize. The farmhouse is now connected to all the mains supplies. Some of the land is rented to other farmers for the grazing of sheep and cattle.
